attributes.action: Help keep Neighbours on bbc1 and not move it to itv.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it has been reported in the national press that itv are trying to poach the t.v programme "Neighbours" off of the bbc.
This would be a seriously bad move because i fear they would move the start time earlier than it is on bbc, therefore the workers of this world would miss it when they arrived home from work, thus creating a bad atmostphere beacause the veiwer would have "neighbours withdrwl syndrome".

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
